name: Inevitable (Games By Harry x)
description:
Another tiny project, initially made within 26 minutes for the 2.6 challenge (https://www.twopointsixchallenge.co.uk/), before I spent another half an hour trying to make it look pretty (I may have achieved the opposite).

I won't try too hard to explain what this is or what it means, and I won't pretend it's more than a throwaway experiment. Instead, I'll just let you see it, play it and make your own decisions on what you see and how it makes you feel.

Enjoy!
